Constructor.

template<class T >
Singleton< T >::SingletonHelper::~SingletonHelper (  )  [inline]

Destructor.

Calls release, ensuring the instance pointer is deleted if it points to a valid object

Member Function Documentation

template<class T >
T * Singleton< T >::SingletonHelper::Instance (  )  [inline]

Constructor.

If the class instance does not exist, it will be created and returned; if it does exist, the existing pointer will be returned.

Returns:
T*
